title: The massless gravitino and the AdS/CFT correspondence
abstract: We solve the Dirichlet boundary value problem for the massless gravitino on $AdS_{d+1}$ space and compute the two-point function of the dual CFT supersymmetry currents using the $AdS$/CFT correspondence principle. We find analogously to the spinor case that the boundary data for the massless $(d+1)$ dimensional bulk gravitino field consists of only a $(d-1)$ dimensional gravitino.
